messages.subject: South Carolina (Attn Kathie)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, neighbor Kathie! I m in Moncks Corner. My daughter is 16; just pulled her out of public school in May. We ve been unschooling since and will continue to do
messages.messageBody:
Hi, neighbor Kathie!

I'm in Moncks Corner. My daughter is 16; just pulled her out of public
school in May. We've been unschooling since and will continue to do so.
It's new for both of us!

No, I'm not with a support group. There is one that meets monthly at
our church (First Baptist), but I'm not interested. Everyone around here
looks at me like I'm crazy when I mention unschooling. That support
group has nothing we need. The families in our church (and most others
around here) are homeschooling young/younger children and are using
strictly Christian curriculum.

Have you found ANY kind of an unschooling community here in the
Lowcountry?

Peace,


Denise



Stop by for a cup of tea ~ http://www.angelfire.com/sc/tealover



<Denise where are you? Are you with a support group? I'm in Mt.
Pleasant ... three girls - 7, 5, and 1>
